name: Ditchin
description:
Created in under 48 hours for Ludum Dare 40.

Theme: The more you have, the worse it is

You are flying with some illicit cargo, and you are definitely about to be caught. Ditch everything before being apprehended by the fuzz!

Controls:
WASD / Left Analog Stick - Fly
Space / Left Click / Gamepad Face Buttons - Drop Cargo
Escape - Exit
